title: Heavenly Harold's Hell
description: Harold and his beloved wife Michelle Sinner have the perfect marriage, friendship and are true soul-mates. However, when Michelle is left devastated by Harold's sudden death, things are never the same again. As she tries to grieve and cope with her loss, Harold does all he can from heaven to get back to her. Whilst things are difficult for Michelle on the ground and her emotions bounce around all over the place, things are hardly plain sailing for newly deceased Harold in the clouds either.
author: Jimmy Perrin
